items.title: Implement Analytics Dashboard
items.description: Develop an analytics dashboard to display key project metrics and performance indicators in real-time.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays at least 5 key metrics (e.g., project progress, task completion rate, resource utilization, budget usage, deadline adherence).
Data on the dashboard updates automatically at least every 5 minutes.
Users can filter metrics by project, team, and date range.
Dashboard is accessible from the main navigation menu.
Charts and graphs are interactive and allow drill-down into detailed data.
dependencies: Project data collection and storage system
non_functional: Dashboard loads within 3 seconds for standard datasets
Responsive design for desktop and tablet
Data accuracy within 1% of source records

notes: User input did not specify exact metrics or data sources; assumptions made about common project KPIs and update frequency.
